oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show - Series 3, Program 05 (with Billy Walker)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Series 3, program 5 of a radio show hosted by Hank Thompson with his Brazos Valley Boys (including steel guitarist Lefty Nason) and featuring Billy Walker, to promote Hank's songbook of his Capitol recordings (songbook commercials not included). Circa 1949-1950.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson; Brazos Valley Boys; Billy Walker
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart) -- Opening statement (Hank Thompson) -- Little Cowboy Lullaby (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson introduces Billy Walker -- I'd Trade All Of My Tomorrows (Billy Walker) -- Whoa Sailor (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Steel Guitar Rag (Lefty Nason steel guitar) -- I Am A Pilgrim (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Closing statement (Hank Thompson) -- Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank; Walker, Billy, 1929-2006; Brazos Valley Boys; Nason, Lefty
